name: Alphabet (Ankit rajpoot)
description: The game theme was rewind so i was trying to make which will look like an old game's , and the game is based on letter you have to collect some letter and crash letter so you will get point that with help you to complete your level  and the letter that you have to collect will to told you in a scene. with some twist when you collect the letter's your crash point will decrease so  you have to crash more letter to increase your crash point that was  all about my game . thank you  and it was my first game jam
